sentences.sContent: They endured hours of backbreaking work in miserable conditions.
sentences.sCn: 他们在恶劣条件下忍受长时间的繁重劳动。

sentences.sContent: Mosquito bites can make life miserable .
sentences.sCn: 蚊子叮咬会让人很难受。

remMethod.val: miser(同情) + able(能…的) → 令人同情的 → 悲惨的

words.tran: 贫困地；可悲地；糟糕地；非常不幸地

trans.tranOther: making you feel very unhappy, uncomfortable etc
